general_query_parameters.name: tok
general_query_parameters.description: List of full text search tokens

general_query_parameters.name: tax
general_query_parameters.description: List of key value pairs. Key is taxonomy tag, value is taxonomy value

sample_query_parameters.name: fields
sample_query_parameters.description: List of fields to include in a response

sample_query_parameters.name: order
sample_query_parameters.description: List of fields used to sort a response. A field prefixed with a hyphen (-) should be sorted in descendant order
